thread.title: Wayne A McDonald To Give Lighting Presentation At October Great Lakes Area .NET User Group Meeting
thread.title_full: Wayne A McDonald To Give Lighting Presentation At October Great Lakes Area .NET User Group Meeting

author: prbuzz.com
title: Wayne A McDonald To Give Lighting Presentation At October Great Lakes Area .NET User Group Meeting
text:
On Wednesday, 21 October 2015, Wayne A McDonald will give a presentation "Getting Your LinkedIn Page To The Top of Google" to the community.
Clinton Township, Michigan â€“ As a new member of the Great Lakes Area .NET User Group, Wayne A McDonald wanted to make a contribution to the group of something that could help them of someone they knew if this ever changing economy. Some people in computer programming and related fields change employers often, and having your LinkedIn page findable for future employers can be helpful. And for those who work in the area of search engine optimization, having your LinkedIn page rank well can be a point of pride.
At the Great Lakes Area .NET User Group monthly meetings, the meetings have one or two Lighting Presentations to start the meeting. These are short, as in ten minutes or less, presentations on an unusual topic or on a topic loosely related to topic(s) related to computer programming. One recent and unusual topic for a Lighting Presentation was on "How to Pick a Tumbler Lock".
The Great Lakes Area .NET User Group is on Meetup (www.MeetUp.com) and information about past and future meetings (and more) can be found there.
Event: Lighting Presentation
Topic: Getting Your LinkedIn Page To The Top of Google
Speaker: Wayne A McDonald
Level: Beginner+, Intermediate
Date: Wednesday, 21 October 2015
Time: 6:00 PM
Location: Microsoft Office
Address: 1000 Town Center Drive, Suite 1930, Southfield, Michigan 48075
About:
Wayne A McDonald is ongoingly creating Imagine Something Worthy LLC and the Vitamin Mineral Shop LLC. He is a former Chrysler employee, current real estate investor, a member of the local Internet Marketing Club and a new member of the Great Lakes Area .NET User Group. He is using what he is learning at the local Internet Marketing Club to build sites for himself and others. He is continuing to construct and market an online vitamin store and new Internet marketing affiliate sites.
Contact:
Wayne A McDonald
Imagine Something Worthy, LLC
42211 Garfield Road, PMB 123
Clinton Township, Michigan 48038
http://www.ImagineSomethingWorthy.com
Submitted by: Right Now Marketing Group LLC
